x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact:
This solution will be able to visualize everyone about their life trends and where they are moving forward.

Everyone has some up and down limit in expenses, health, learning and other major things in life. 

Using this solution will try to make sure, one person is following his or her life trend in proper way.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Every person needs to track the trend of their life, be it their expenses or health data or learning. This way everyone can visualize the up down curve of their daily life. We should not go out of limit in terms of expenses or healthy lifestyle or learning period. If we know, we are on track or need to improve the curve, many of the problems in life will be gone.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Tables to store data related to Expenses, Health related information, learning and marks.

Record Producer to fill out details by the user and will be of different templates.

Dashboard to reflect the trend.

Portal where user can access the data entry form to capture their expense or health information or learning updates.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Service Portal, Record Producers, PA Dashboards

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Need to design different kinds of record producer forms for different activity tracking.
